title: S15 Ep20: Collision Course With The Afterlife
itunes:title: Collision Course With The Afterlife
description:
Darkness Radio presents Collision Course with Afterlife with guest David Ditchfield.

Across thousands of years, people have described one of the most astonishing of all human phenomena: the near-death experience (NDE), the subjective experience of an Afterlife, a place where we apparently survive death.
This is exactly what happened to David Ditchfield.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

Visit his site here: http://www.shineonthestory.com/
